survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from freelancers regarding their experience using our platform, focusing on usability, support, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using our freelancer platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using our freelancer platform?

questions.question_text: Which features of the platform do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: Which features of the platform do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced while using the platform.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced while using the platform.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our platform to other freelancers?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for benchmarking.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our platform to other freelancers?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the platform?
